Localization.Name: Terrapin 2954 Ship Showdown Poster
Localization.Description: A poster commemorating the Anvil Aerospace Terrapin making its way in the final four of the 2954 Ship Showdown. Outfitted with long-range scanners and encased in heavy armor and oversized shields, the Terrapin faces potentially hazardous circumstances with confidence.
